General Test Script: 

```{R}
test <- readRDS("/Users/jmarti16/Desktop/ExampleUpdate.rds")
test1 <- test
test1@result$GeneRatio <- as.numeric(sapply(strsplit(test@result$GeneRatio, "/"), function(x) as.numeric(x[1]) / as.numeric(x[2]))) # Covert string GeneRatio Fractions into numeric Fractions. 
go_terms <- test$ID
go_terms <- unname(go_terms)
simMatrix <- calculateSimMatrix(go_terms, orgdb = "org.Hs.eg.db", ont = "MF", method = "Rel")


# shinyEnrichment(test, simMatrix = y)

```
Tree Plot test

```{R}
scores <- setNames(-log10(test$qvalue), test$ID)
reduceTerms <- reduceSimMatrix(simMatrix, scores, threshold = 0.7, orgdb = "org.Hs.eg.db")


```
